head.title: Metro Briefing | Calendar: Tomorrow: Regulation Of Airspace Over New York

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | Calendar: Tomorrow: Regulation Of Airspace Over New York

block.p: The Federal Aviation Administration plans a public briefing on its plans for directing air traffic over New York, New Jersey and Pennsylvania. New Jersey Institute of Technology, Rooms 3730 and 3740 of the GITC building, 218 Central Avenue in Newark, 1 p.m. Information: (609) 777-2600.

The Federal Aviation Administration plans a public briefing on its plans for directing air traffic over New York, New Jersey and Pennsylvania. New Jersey Institute of Technology, Rooms 3730 and 3740 of the GITC building, 218 Central Avenue in Newark, 1 p.m. Information: (609) 777-2600.
